title: Live the James Bond lifestyle with the release of Spectre
text:
Live the James Bond lifestyle with the release of Spectre Live the James Bond lifestyle with the release of Spectre Details Category: Hotel   12:00 For those searching for more glamour in their lives, for those with a penchant for sipping Heineken in swanky bars, or for those who just want to escape London, Monaco is calling. At Hotel Metropole Monte-Carlo, guests can experience the thrill of Monaco whilst keeping away from the crowds. 
The five star hotel is the epitome of luxury, a place where you would not be surprised to run into 007 himself. Make use of fitness regimes created by ex-Olympian Marc Raquil in the hotel gym, and a gourmet food offering from Joël Robuchon. The luxurious Oitavos 5 star hotel provides guest with the unique opportunity to experience the very place Fleming’s character was born. It was during his career as a Royal Navy intelligence officer in World War Two that he was posted to nearby Estoril. Fleming would often frequent the Estoril Casino and it is thought that Fleming’s first 007 book “Casino Royale”, was based on certain events that took place there. Related articles
